text: Insan dum teuma meu ka meularat Bak Kamoe ligat jilakee beu glah Teuma ‘oh meubri keu jihnyan nikmat Jikheun carong that droejih jipeugah Sabab di jih le jikheun ‘eleumee Jeut keuh meuteumee nikmat le leupah Tapi ujian bandum keu jihnyan Teuma le jihnyan hana jipapah Nyang le that jihnyan hana jiteupue
